âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ 2D vector and raster graphics editing â€¢ Node-based, non-destructive, procedural workflow â€¢ Layer-based compositing â€¢ All-in-one graphics toolbox â€¢ Support for photo editing, motion graphics, digital painting, desktop publishing, and VFX compositing
ðŸ“– Summary: Graphite is a free, open-source 2D graphics editor that combines traditional layer-based editing with a modern node-based procedural workflow. It aims to be an all-in-one graphics toolbox, supporting vector and raster editing, photo editing, motion graphics, and more, built around a core node graph for non-destructive editing.
